name: cloudflarestatus
0:
”Alexa Ask cloud flare status tell me the rerouted regions”
”Alexa Ask cloud flare status how is atlanta region”
”Alexa Ask cloud flare status is cloudflare working in Boston”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cloud flare status
des:
The CloudFlare Status Alexa Skill provides an interface to CloudFlare service status information.

Let CloudFlare Status know what region you want to check and Alexa will respond about its status. You can also ask for summary, of all the currently affected region.

The skill actually access get the information from cloudflare status api.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
